alert.note: Alert for Caddo (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 12:57PM CST until further notice by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Shreveport LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... Cross Bayou At Cross Lake affecting Caddo Parish. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Cross Bayou At Cross Lake. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 PM CST Monday the stage was 173.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:30 PM CST Monday was 173.2 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 173.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 173.2 feet on 05/01/2016. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Tuesday afternoon at 100 PM CST.
